name: GO AWAY, THERE'S KUMIS OVER THERE!
description: This arcade runner is about a horse and our favorite drink - kumis! Collect cookies, pick up items like multipliers, bombs, HPs and try to get as high score as you can. Cookies are your best friends in that game!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP/Vista/7/8/8.1/10 Processor: 1.1 GHz CPU Memory: 256 MB RAM Graphics: Any Videocard Storage: 150 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7/Vista/8/8.1/10 Processor: 1.1 GHz CPU Memory: 256 MB RAM Graphics: 256MB Videocard Storage: 200 MB available space

reviews.review_text: GO AWAY, THIS GAME IS OVER THERE!
